user_question: What are the current real estate trends in Tokyo, and can you generate an image of a futuristic Tokyo skyline?
final_answer: Current real estate trends in Tokyo include a rise in smart home technology, increased demand for co-living spaces, and a focus on sustainable building practices. Image of a futuristic Tokyo skyline generated. The average price per square meter in central Tokyo is approximately 1.2 million JPY.
